reviewText: Amazing documentary of this annual wrestling event.

As the cover picture shows, the men in this video are incredible. However, those frontal, clear shots are rare. Most of the time, the men are only seen from the back. As the product description states, there is no nudity. In addition, the whole thing was filmed outside in bright sunshine, so there is a lot of glare. There is no dialogue or narration. The only sound is the referees' whistles and the announcements over the loudspeakers (in Turkish). So, unless you have a fetish for the wrestling itself (I don't), there is very little erotic in this film.
